name: Alexios Delis 0001
content: Home Page of Alex Delis - University of Athens Alex Delis Department of Informatics and Telecommunications University of Athens GR15703, Athens, Greece Tel: +30-210-727.5212, Fax: +30-210-727.5185 E-mail: ad -at* di *dot- uoa -dot* gr Short Biography Research Interests: Distributed and Virtualized Systems, Management of Big Data and Software Systems Research Articles Teaching: M149: Database Management Systems M125: Special Topics in Cloud Computing K22: Operating Systems M222: Analysis of Social Networks Classes taught at UoA in the past Misc: Random URLs & assorted information. ad At di dot- uoa -dot gr
